txt.en: The Orcs of Moria have begun mustering in Fanuidhol in preparation to assault Lothlórien.

'[placeholder], it is grim to see the banners of the Orcs flying in Fanuidhol. They have come too close to our borders and must be taught that these lands belong to the Galadhrim.

'Enter the lumber-camp at Drûmaudhul and burn the Orc-banner which flies there. That should show them that we do not fear them. And should the champion of Drûmaudhul arrive, deal with him as well.

'Drûmaudhul lies to the north-west of here. When you have done this deed, return to me.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: While Fanuidhol Defence is active, Raingon will not be available for quest completion or comments. You will have to wait for Fanuidhol Defence to end to complete this quest.</rgb>

Drûmaudhul lies to the north-west from Talan Gwilith.

Raingon has asked you to burn the Orc-banner at Drûmaudhul and defeat the camp's champion.

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: While Fanuidhol Defence is active, Raingon will not be available for quest completion or comments. You will have to wait for Fanuidhol Defence to end to complete this quest.</rgb>
'You have burned the Orc-banner at Drûmaudhul and defeated their champion? You have done well, indeed, [placeholder]!'

Raingon is at Talan Gwilith, south-east of Drûmaudhul.

You should return to Raingon with the tidings of your victory at Drûmaudhul.

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: While Fanuidhol Defence is active, Raingon will not be available for quest completion or comments. You will have to wait for Fanuidhol Defence to end to complete this quest.</rgb>

'Head to the north-west of here to Drûmaudhul and deal with the enemy there.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Note: While Fanuidhol Defence is active, Raingon will not be available for quest completion or comments. You will have to wait for Fanuidhol Defence to end to complete this quest.</rgb>
Burn banner at Drûmaudhul and defeat Rukalai
Talk to Raingon at Talan Gwilith
Talk to Raingon at Talan Gwilith
